metadata.title: CVE-2021-37232 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A stack overflow vulnerability occurs in Atomicparsley 20210124.204813.840499f through APar_read64() in src/util.cpp due to the lack of buffer size of uint32_buffer while reading more bytes in APar_read64.

criterions.comment: atomicparsley package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
